title: MrAndras
author: MrAndras
content: Does anybody knows the profile of scammer Sara Leppänen?In the mean while I will contact the other 4 women, to ask about where Sara is located, but how to do that without alerting Sara?If other people got scammed by Localbitcoins.com let me know. Once I found out where they live I pay money to arrest her.https://scontent.fmnl4-6.fna.fbcdn.net/v/t31.18172-8/18922871_1907219356203118_3970188639793801607_o.jpg?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=9267fe&_nc_ohc=LTcWRf22RCgAX_TQyGf&_nc_ht=scontent.fmnl4-6.fna&oh=00_AfD4WZ-OokNCQuzccgaFeu7fEzet8f6UPwOBp6eFp6DLyw&oe=645281C2https://www.facebook.com/miiko.fi/photos/a.1432847936973598/1907219356203118/?type=3QuoteTimanttinen tiimimme on kasvanut viimeisen vuoden aikana!Markkinointia ja viestintäämme vahvistaa osaamisellaan SaraLeppänen, ja hyväntuuliseen myyntitiimiimme on hypännyt mukaan Virva Hämäläinen. Ruotsissa agenttinamme toimii SariEkberg-Tamminen. Ruotsissa meillä on nykyäänkahdenkymmenen jälleenmyyjän verran upeita yhteistyökumppaneita. On onni saada tehdä töitä inspiroivien ja innostuneiden osaajien kanssa!Mikäli et vielä ole tutustunut tarinaamme, käy kurkkaamassa,mistä kaikki sai alkunsa:http://www.miiko.fi/me.html Address of the company:Miiko Design OyPellavamäentie 504320 TUUSULA+358 40 589 3999Contact details of the owners of the company who have contact with Sara:Sanna Paakki Suunnittelu, jälleenmyynti +358 40 589 3999sanna@miiko.fiMiiaMiia PiiroinenYritysmyynti, jälleenmyynti, liikelahjat+358 44 974 9009miia@miiko.fiVirvaVirva LiukkoYritysmyynti, jälleenmyynti, liikelahjat+358 44 9808175virva@miiko.fiHillaHilla NäsänenTaloushallinto, tilaustenkäsittely +358 50 9172144miiko@miiko.fi

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: So what localbitcoins do to you. Show your proof and everything, i remember they let their users withdraw the remaining balance in there accounts. For your question, well this is a bitcoin forum where privacy matters and prioritized so asking personal information here of someone else is useless. Unless that person is an active user here who has passed p2p transaction of someone else.

comments.author: pixie85
comments.body: Please follow the format for scam accusations. This isn't an accusation but more of a plea. Maybe offer some reward and put it in the service section, although paying to dox someone is not going to make you popular in this community. Quote from: MrAndras on April 03, 2023, 06:24:01 PMOnce I found out where they live I pay money to arrest her.Does that mean you have access to dirty cops? I don't live in a country where you can pay the police to get someone arrested, but I've heard it's a common thing in some countries. The way they put Tate brothers in jail speaks for itself.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: I don't know what OP's problem is. He doesn't take any form of advice. Members have tried to advise him in other threads about the proper way of reporting a scam, but he instead takes offence, like in this thread - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5445054.0Maybe he thinks spamming with new topics is going to help him.

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: Quote from: MrAndras on April 03, 2023, 06:24:01 PM-snip-Does anybody knows the profile of scammer Sara Leppänen?This https://fi.linkedin.com/in/sara-lepp%C3%A4nen-056269124Quote from: MrAndras on April 03, 2023, 06:24:01 PM-snip-In the mean while I will contact the other 4 women, to ask about where Sara is located, but how to do that without alerting Sara?The question was she currently on evasion? If you don't involve the authorities locating someone, you are basically terrorizing and none of her close relatives will tell you.I think the company's important figures just want to meet someone on charges by way of summons.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Such actions are very loud OP. Arresting some one for some certain reasons must have a proof and factual evidence before you proceed. You really have not Stated what her offence was even if it is known by others how about those who have no idea what is going on so as to assist you if the needs be. I think you should try present something tangible  as always so that the people who come across this post would see and know what your claims are all about before they advise or help you out. I am afraid no one would really give you that attention as it is reasons being that you have no facts to present OP.

comments.author: stompix
comments.body: Aren't you getting tired up coming here every week with the same topics, mistaken CEOs names, wrong details and obviously having no clue what you're talking about?Quote from: MrAndras on April 03, 2023, 06:24:01 PMIn the mean while I will contact the other 4 women, to ask about where Sara is located, but how to do that without alerting Sara?Better ask yourself how you're not going to alert the police with your stupid games, you know what they say, play stupid games win stupid prizes.Quote from: MrAndras on April 03, 2023, 06:24:01 PMOnce I found out where they live I pay money to arrest her.Unfortunately for you this is not a game, you can't pay money to arrest somebody, if you have a real legal complaint file one with the FINE, then if unresolved go to the next step and open a civil dispute in a Finish claim court, it's available even for citizens outside EU.But yeah, keep harassing and threatening people over the internet and dream of it having no consequences for you, let's see how this end.

comments.author: MrAndras
comments.body: Quote from: logfiles on April 03, 2023, 11:58:00 PMI don't know what OP's problem is. He doesn't take any form of advice. Members have tried to advise him in other threads about the proper way of reporting a scam, but he instead takes offence, like in this thread - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5445054.0Maybe he thinks spamming with new topics is going to help him.Does this forum supports uploading pictures or Videos?

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: Quote from: MrAndras on April 06, 2023, 02:56:55 PMDoes this forum supports uploading pictures or Videos?Yes for images (can only display images uploaded on other sites like image hosting) and no for videos (only thumbnails will be displayed), but at least you must first achieve at least Jr. rank. Check out this guide. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=4508777.0

comments.author: acroman08
comments.created_time: April 06, 2023, 04:57:17 PMLast edit: April 06, 2023, 06:01:01 PM by acroman08
comments.body: Quote from: MrAndras on April 06, 2023, 02:56:55 PMQuote from: logfiles on April 03, 2023, 11:58:00 PMI don't know what OP's problem is. He doesn't take any form of advice. Members have tried to advise him in other threads about the proper way of reporting a scam, but he instead takes offence, like in this thread - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5445054.0Maybe he thinks spamming with new topics is going to help him.Does this forum supports uploading pictures or Videos?I'm just adding this to what rat03gopoh posted. you can also buy a copper membership to be able to post images if you don't want to wait to get merit and get enough activity to rank up. aside from being able to post images it also bypasses/reduced some other newbie restrictions too. you can check this thread for more informationNewbies can now pay a small fee to enable images

comments.author: CYBER_COWBOY
comments.created_time: June 06, 2023, 09:06:11 AMLast edit: June 06, 2023, 10:19:04 AM by CYBER_COWBOY
comments.body: Hello. You gave me feedback without a valid reason.Could you please remove it?Thanks.

Once I found out where they live I pay money to arrest her.https://www.facebook.com/miiko.fi/photos/a.1432847936973598/1907219356203118/?type=3QuoteTimanttinen tiimimme on kasvanut viimeisen vuoden aikana!Markkinointia ja viestintäämme vahvistaa osaamisellaan SaraLeppänen, ja hyväntuuliseen myyntitiimiimme on hypännyt mukaan Virva Hämäläinen. Ruotsissa agenttinamme toimii SariEkberg-Tamminen. Ruotsissa meillä on nykyäänkahdenkymmenen jälleenmyyjän verran upeita yhteistyökumppaneita. On onni saada tehdä töitä inspiroivien ja innostuneiden osaajien kanssa!Mikäli et vielä ole tutustunut tarinaamme, käy kurkkaamassa,mistä kaikki sai alkunsa:http://www.miiko.fi/me.html Address of the company:Miiko Design OyPellavamäentie 504320 TUUSULA+358 40 589 3999Contact details of the owners of the company who have contact with Sara:Sanna Paakki Suunnittelu, jälleenmyynti +358 40 589 3999sanna@miiko.fiMiiaMiia PiiroinenYritysmyynti, jälleenmyynti, liikelahjat+358 44 974 9009miia@miiko.fiVirvaVirva LiukkoYritysmyynti, jälleenmyynti, liikelahjat+358 44 9808175virva@miiko.fiHillaHilla NäsänenTaloushallinto, tilaustenkäsittely +358 50 9172144miiko@miiko.fiProvide more information, if possible screenshots of what happened. Imsuggest you report to the authorities in the country. Taking a rougue action without involving the authorities might have serious repercussions.Wish you the best!

comments.author: 348Judah
comments.body: As i can understand this whole issues, it does not appear to me like a scam accusation but rather maybe you're trying to make a post to request for other's interest in assisting you make research on that particular andbjust as it had already been suggested to you, it may include you making an additional reward to make such for anyone that provides for you what's needed, this board is actually meant for scam related accusations, file a report and provide evidence to back them up about any service or member of this forum round doing the unusual or the unexpected.

comments.author: Broadanbig
comments.body: OP I was thinking about the genesis of this saga and what had happened to have resulted in your actions of getting them arrested but before you would want input here and as this board says scam accusations, you will have to present proof that such person (s) had committed an offense against you to warrant your arrest threat otherwise it holds no water. Of you must carry out such actions and want help from this platform, you must present evidence that the mentioned names as Listed by you have truly committed the crimes you accused them of.

comments.author: Zetfexboo59
comments.body: Quote from: Broadanbig on June 06, 2023, 02:12:44 PMOP I was thinking about the genesis of this saga and what had happened to have resulted in your actions of getting them arrested but before you would want input here and as this board says scam accusations, you will have to present proof that such person (s) had committed an offense against you to warrant your arrest threat otherwise it holds no water. Of you must carry out such actions and want help from this platform, you must present evidence that the mentioned names as Listed by you have truly committed the crimes you accused them of.OP did not even explain about what really transpired between them. No images about their transaction or whatever.  It's just him posting private information of someone publicly.
